column4: I just got a WinTV-HVR-950Q TV Tuner. It seems to want to use ATSC, which my current distribution does not seem to handle. Does anyone know if trying Ubuntu would help?
Does anyone watch TV on their computer thru a TV Tuner in america?
i have, many moons ago, but don't anymore
xbmc isn't gonna let you watch TV unless you have your TV tuner working
